verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> bish-lo-Shim Now it came to pass in the thirtieth שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year בָּֽרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> ba-re-vi-'I in the fourth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> ba-cha-mish-Shah [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I בְתֽוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> ve-toch- as I [was] among הַגּוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah the captives עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- was by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> ke-Var; of Chebar נִפְתְּחוּ֙ <S%H6605><s%> nif-te-Chu were opened הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, [that] the heavens וָאֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh and I saw מַרְא֥וֹת <S%H4759><s%> mar-'ot visions אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> ba-cha-mish-Shah In the fifth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah year הַחֲמִישִׁ֔ית <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shit, which [was] the fifth לְגָל֖וּת <S%H1546><s%> le-ga-Lut captivity הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech of king יוֹיָכִֽין׃ <S%H3112><s%> yo-ya-Chin. Jehoiachin's

הָיֹ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yoh came הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah expressly דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְחֶזְקֵ֨אל <S%H3168><s%> ye-chez-Kel came expressly unto Ezekiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בּוּזִ֧י <S%H941><s%> bu-Zi of Buzi הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim of the Chaldeans עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> ke-Var; Chebar וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi came עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham and there יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- and the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וָאֵ֡רֶא <S%H7200><s%> va-'E-re And I looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold ר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach wind סְעָרָ֜ה <S%H5591><s%> se-'a-Rah A storm בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ah came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַצָּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-Fon, out of the north עָנָ֤ן <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan cloud גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> ga-dOl a great וְאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> ve-'Esh and a fire מִתְלַקַּ֔חַת <S%H3947><s%> mit-lak-Ka-chat, infolding וְנֹ֥גַֽהּ <S%H5051><s%> ve-No-gah itself and a brightness ל֖וֹ lo סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; [was] about וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> u-Mit-to-Chah, it and out of the midst כְּעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> ke-'Ein thereof as the colour הַחַשְׁמַ֖ל <S%H2830><s%> ha-chash-Mal of amber מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh. of the fire

וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> u-Mit-to-Chah, Also out of the midst דְּמ֖וּת <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut thereof [came] the likeness אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' of four חַיּ֑וֹת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yot; living creatures וְזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh and this מַרְאֵֽיהֶ֔ן <S%H4758><s%> mar-'ei-Hen, And this [was] their appearance דְּמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut had the likeness אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of a man לָהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> la-Hen-nah. they

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah had four פָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim faces לְאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> le-'e-Chat; And every one וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba' had four כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fa-yim wings לְאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> le-'a-Chat and every one לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> ve-rag-lei-Hem And their feet רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Re-gel feet יְשָׁרָ֑ה <S%H3477><s%> ye-sha-Rah; [were] straight וְכַ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> ve-Chaf and the sole רַגְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H7272><s%> rag-lei-Hem, of their feet כְּכַף֙ <S%H3709><s%> ke-Chaf [was] like the sole רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Re-gel foot עֵ֔גֶל <S%H5695><s%> 'E-gel, of a calf's וְנֹ֣צְצִ֔ים <S%H5340><s%> ve-No-tze-Tzim, and they sparkled כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> ke-'Ein like the colour נְחֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet brass קָלָֽל׃ <S%H7044><s%> ka-Lal. of burnished

וְיָדֹו ve-ya-dov כוִידֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> vi-Dei able קאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of a man מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Under כַּנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3671><s%> kan-fei-Hem, under their wings עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba-'at on their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H7253><s%> riv-'ei-Hem; sides וּפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-nei-Hem had their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3671><s%> ve-chan-fei-Hem and their wings לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽם׃ <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tam. and they four

חֹֽבְרֹ֛ת <S%H2266><s%> choe-Rot [were] joined אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֲחוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tah to another כַּנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3671><s%> kan-fei-Hem; Their wings לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not יִסַּ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> yis-Sab-bu they turned בְלֶכְתָּ֔ן <S%H1980><s%> ve-lech-Tan, moved אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> 'E-ver straight פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav forward יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu. went

וּדְמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> u-de-Mut As for the likeness פְּנֵיהֶם֮ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Hem of their faces פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei had the face אָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of a man וּפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-Nei and the face אַרְיֵ֤ה <S%H738><s%> 'ar-Yeh of a lion אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הַיָּמִין֙ <S%H3225><s%> hai-ya-Min on the right side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֔ם <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tam, they four וּפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-nei- had the face שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor of an ox מֵֽהַשְּׂמֹ֖אול <S%H8040><s%> me-has-se-Mol on the left side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tan; and they four וּפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-nei- also had the face נֶ֖שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> Ne-sher of an eagle לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tan. they four

וּפְנֵיהֶ֕ם <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-nei-Hem Thus [were] their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3671><s%> ve-chan-fei-Hem and their wings פְּרֻד֖וֹת <S%H6504><s%> pe-ru-Dot [were] stretched מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah; upward לְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish, [wings] of every one שְׁ֚תַּיִם <S%H8147><s%> ta-yim two חֹבְר֣וֹת <S%H2266><s%> choe-Rot [were] joined אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, one וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Ta-yim and two מְכַסּ֔וֹת <S%H3680><s%> me-chas-Sot, covered אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et גְּוִיֹתֵיהֶֽנָה׃ <S%H1472><s%> ge-vi-yo-tei-He-nah their bodies

וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> 'E-ver straight פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav forward יֵלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu; went אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> 'el about אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become שָׁ֨מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it הָר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach whither the spirit לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to go יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu, go לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> yis-Sab-bu [and] they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽן׃ <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-Tan. went

וּדְמ֨וּת <S%H1823><s%> u-de-Mut As for the likeness הַחַיּ֜וֹת <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yot of the living creatures מַרְאֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4758><s%> mar-'ei-Hem their appearance כְּגַחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> ke-ga-cha-lei- coals אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, of fire בֹּֽעֲרוֹת֙ <S%H1197><s%> bo-'a-rOt [was] like burning כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'Eh [and] like the appearance הַלַּפִּדִ֔ים <S%H3940><s%> hal-lap-pi-Dim, of lamps הִ֕יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he מִתְהַלֶּ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> mit-hal-Le-chet it went up and down בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הַחַיּ֑וֹת <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yot; among the living creatures וְנֹ֣גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> ve-No-gah was bright לָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> la-'Esh, and the fire וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- from הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh and out of the fire יוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze went forth בָרָֽק׃ <S%H1300><s%> va-Rak. lightning

וְהַחַיּ֖וֹת <S%H2416><s%> ve-ha-chai-Yot And the living creatures רָצ֣וֹא <S%H7519><s%> ra-Tzo ran וָשׁ֑וֹב <S%H7725><s%> va-Shov; and returned כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'Eh as the appearance הַבָּזָֽק׃ <S%H965><s%> hab-ba-Zak. of a flash of lightning

וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> va-'E-re Now as I beheld הַחַיּ֑וֹת <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yot; the living creatures וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אוֹפַ֨ן <S%H212><s%> o-Fan wheel אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad behold one בָּאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz upon the earth אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel by הַחַיּ֖וֹת <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yot the living creatures לְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-Ba-'at with his four פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav. faces

מַרְאֵ֨ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh The appearance הָאוֹפַנִּ֤ים <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-fan-Nim of the wheels וּמַעֲשֵׂיהֶם֙ <S%H4639><s%> u-ma-'a-sei-Hem and their work כְּעֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> ke-'Ein [was] like unto the colour תַּרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> tar-Shish, of a beryl וּדְמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> u-de-Mut likeness אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tan; and they four וּמַרְאֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4758><s%> u-mar-'ei-Hem and their appearance וּמַ֣עֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <S%H4639><s%> u-Ma-'a-sei-Hem, and their work כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-Fan [was] as it were a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the middle הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-Fan. of a wheel

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in אַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba-'at upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H7253><s%> riv-'ei-Hen sides בְּלֶכְתָּ֣ם <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-Tam moved יֵלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu; moved לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> yis-Sab-bu [and] they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽן׃ <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-Tan. moved

וְגַ֨בֵּיהֶ֔ן <S%H1354><s%> ve-Gab-bei-Hen, As for their rings וְגֹ֥בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> ve-Goah they were so high לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like וְיִרְאָ֣ה <S%H3374><s%> ve-yir-'Ah that they were dreadful לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem; like וְגַבֹּתָ֗ם <S%H1354><s%> ve-gab-bo-Tam, and their rings מְלֵאֹ֥ת <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Ot [were] full עֵינַ֛יִם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yim of eyes סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tan. them four

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> u-ve-Le-chet moved הַֽחַיּ֔וֹת <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yot, And when the living creatures יֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu moved הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-fan-Nim the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <S%H681><s%> 'etz-Lam; by them וּבְהִנָּשֵׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> u-ve-hin-na-Se were lifted up הַֽחַיּוֹת֙ <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-yOt and when the living creatures מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, from the earth יִנָּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> yin-na-se-'U were lifted up הָאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-fan-Nim. the wheels

עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become שָּׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> sham direction הָר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach Whithersoever the spirit לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to go יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu, go שָׁ֥מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah direction הָר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach thither [was their] spirit לָלֶ֑כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet; to go וְהָאוֹפַנִּ֗ים <S%H212><s%> ve-ha-'o-fan-Nim, and the wheels יִנָּשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> yin-na-se-'U were lifted up לְעֻמָּתָ֔ם <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-ma-Tam, over against כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach them for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah of the living creature בָּאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H212><s%> ba-'o-fan-Nim.
